ygData.subject: RE: Feign Death
ygData.msgSnippet: I was able to split mobs once they were out of line of sight last night.  I was in Cazic, just chatting with some friends and messing around, and they asked me
ygData.messageBody:
I was able to split mobs once they were out of line of sight last night. I
was in Cazic, just chatting with some friends and messing around, and they
asked me to pull a bit before I went off to bed. They had a new guy with
them who had never heard of feign pulling and they wanted me to show him.
Nothing difficult, mind you, as it was mostly a demonstration. I never
pulled anything tougher than Fanatic/Zealots/etc, but I had no trouble
spliting them once they got out of line of sight.

Lei

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Tim Perkins [mailto:tperkins@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, November 16, 1999 1:33 PM
> To: EQ-Monks@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [EQ-Monks] Feign Death
>
>
> From: "Tim Perkins" <tperkins@...>
>
> Sorry to disagree with you but the flame goblins I let go
> back to thier
> spots were in no way in line of sight and neither were the
> Dar froggies my
> friend experimented with.
